speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Jordan Smith?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Jordan. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming, Jordan. I'm calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Also, could you confirm your address for security purposes?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you for verifying that information. You currently have a balance of $500. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half right now and the rest by the end of the month.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds reasonable. So, you'll pay $250 today and the remaining $250 by the end of the month?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect. How would you like to make the payment today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can do it via credit card.

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, I will gather your card details. Thank you for your cooperation, Jordan.
